title: Crime Alert 04.02.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 04.02.19
description:
South Carolina college student gets into what she thinks is her Uber, but hours later hunters find her dead body. New York man allegedly kidnaps and sexually assaults a nanny while she’s out for a jog, then strangles her before dumping the body in a lake.  Brian Kennedy allegedly guns down the mother of his children during a custody exchange. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
